name: FlipPix Art - Professions
description:
NEW! FlipPix Art - Professions is now designed for both the iPhone and iPad.

A butcher, a baker, a candlestick maker? FlipPix - Professions spins out some more options for you to consider - a carpenter, a magician, a chef, a vet, and more with 252 puzzles in a variety of sizes from 5x5 to 20x20.

An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of paintings. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

Also known as nonograms or griddlers, FlipPix Art puzzles are designed for both the iPhone and iPad.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
